name: Forsake Maddox Mid Light Trail Shoes - Men's
description: A modern spin on the classic hiking boot, the Maddox Mid provides the protection and stability you need in the backcountry while looking good in the coffee shop. Full waterproof construction keeps your feet dry on wet and muddy trails, and versatile rubber outsole gives you reliable traction on dirt or tarmac.Durable suede and nylon upper with TPU overlays for abrasion-resistance.HydroGuard™ waterproof-breathable membrane and taped seams.Moisture-wicking liner moves sweat away from your foot.Gusseted tongue keeps out trail debris.Compression-moulded EVA midsole cushions and supports.Peak-to-Pavement™ outsole for multi-surface traction.Forsake have partnered with the Carbonfund.org Foundation, a leader in energy efficiency, forestry and renewable energy projects. A portion of the profit from every sale is donated to offset all of Forsake’s operating activities and shipping.
